title: Effect of the central bank of Sewell selling bonds

content.description:
In answering the question, you should emphasize the line of reasoning that generated your results; it is not enough to list the results of your analysis. Include correctly labeled diagrams, if useful or required, in explaining your answers. A correctly labeled diagram must have all axes and curves clearly labeled and must show directional changes.

Assume the banking system in the country of Sewell has limited reserves, and the central bank of Sewell sells bonds on the open market.

Assume that banks in Sewell have no excess reserves. What is the effect of the central bank’s action on the amount of customer loans that banks in Sewell can make?

Using a correctly labeled graph of the money market, show the effect of the central bank’s action on the nominal interest rate in Sewell.

What is the effect of the central bank’s action on each of the following in Sewell?

Price level

Real interest rate. Explain.

Given your answer in part (c)(ii), how is the international value of Sewell’s currency, the ono, affected? Explain.
content.question: Respond to all parts of the question.

frqParts.text: Respond to all parts of the question.
